Description: Validate that the search bar filters products accurately by name, description, or tags.
Preconditions: Application is running, user logged in.
Test Steps: 1. Open the Furniro homepage. 2. Enter a valid product name in the search bar. 3. Verify that relevant products appear.
Expected Result: Products matching the search query are displayed correctly.

Description: Ensure filters apply correctly based on user-selected  price.
Test Steps: 1. Go to the category page. 2. Select a category and apply a price filter. 3. Verify that only relevant products appear.
Expected Result: Products are filtered correctly based on the selected criteria.

Description: Ensure Pagination Component apply correctly based on the products.
Test Steps: 1. Go to the shop page. 2. scroll down to the page. 3. change the page to see more products.
Expected Result: Products are filtered correctly based on the selected criteria.

Description: Verify the checkout process prompts the user to fill in the required details before placing an order.
Test Steps: 1. Add products to the cart. 2. Navigate to the checkout page. 3. Try to place an order without filling in all details. 4. Verify that an error message appears.
Expected Result: User is prompted to fill out the required form before proceeding.

Description: Test that clicking on a product redirects to its respective detail page with correct data.
Test Steps: 1. Open the product listing page. 2. Click on a product. 3. Verify that the correct product detail page is displayed.
Expected Result: Dynamic product page loads correctly with product details.

Description: Verify user dashboard shows order status when logged in.
Preconditions: User is logged in and has orders.
Test Steps: 1. Log in with a valid user account. 2. Navigate to the dashboard. 3. Verify that past orders and their statuses are visible.
Expected Result: Dashboard displays the order details (e.g., active, pending, completed).
